newsitem.title: USA: Nevada Power seeks summer power supplies.
newsitem.headline: Nevada Power seeks summer power supplies.

text.p: Nevada Power Co is asking for bids to supply the utility with power during its peak summer demand period during 1997 through 2001, company spokesman Tom Henley said Wednesday.
Nevada Power is seeking 200 megawatts (MW) from June through August in 1997 and 1998 and for 300 MW during the same period in 1999 through 2001, he noted.
Suppliers have the option of including May or September deliveries to their proposals.
The planned purchases are "purely due to the growth we have experienced," Henley said, noting that Nevada Power's customer base increased by 7.2 percent in the latest quarter.
Sales proposals are due at the company by November 12.
